topic: Generative Foundation Models and Technological Milestones

  entities:
    Stephen R. Covey|Person
    OpenAI|Organization
    Anthropic|Organization
    Google|Organization
    US government|Organization
    CRFM|Organization
    Stanford HAI|Organization
    Mistral|Technology
    Stable Diffusion XL 1.0|Model
    Llama 2|Model
    Meta|Organization
    Llama Guard|Technology
    Mixtral|Technology
    GPT-4|Model
    Claude Series|Model
    ChatGPT|Model
    Palm|Model
    Llama 3|Model
    Gemini 1.5 Flash|Model
    TrustLLM|Tool
    Deepseek-R1|Model
    OpenAI o3-mini|Model
    IBM Granite Guardian|Model

  proposition: Stephen R. Covey defines trust as the glue of life and the most essential ingredient in effective communication.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Stephen R. Covey|DESCRIBED_BY|trust as the glue of life
    Stephen R. Covey|DESCRIBED_BY|most essential ingredient in effective communication

  proposition: Trust is the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Trust|DESCRIBED_BY|foundational principle
    Trust|HOLDS|relationships

  proposition: Generative models are machine learning models trained to learn underlying data distribution.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative models|TYPE|machine learning models
    Generative models|TRAINED_TO|learn underlying data distribution

  proposition: Generative models can generate new data instances resembling training dataset characteristics.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative models|CAPABILITY|generate new data instances
    Generative models|RESEMBLES|training dataset characteristics

  proposition: Generative models have applications in generating realistic images, texts, and videos.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative models|APPLICATION|generating realistic images
    Generative models|APPLICATION|generating realistic texts
    Generative models|APPLICATION|generating realistic videos

  proposition: Generative models potentially drive advancements in scientific discovery, healthcare, and autonomous systems.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative models|POTENTIAL_IMPACT|scientific discovery
    Generative models|POTENTIAL_IMPACT|healthcare
    Generative models|POTENTIAL_IMPACT|autonomous systems

  proposition: Common generative models include Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), Variational Autoencoders (VAEs), Diffusion Models, and Large Language Models (LLMs).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative models|INCLUDES|Generative Adversarial Networks
    Generative models|INCLUDES|Variational Autoencoders
    Generative models|INCLUDES|Diffusion Models
    Generative models|INCLUDES|Large Language Models

  proposition: Large Language Models can generate content often indistinguishable from human-produced content.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Large Language Models|CAPABILITY|generate content
    Large Language Models|SIMILARITY|human-produced content

  proposition: Foundation models are large-scale pre-trained models serving as general-purpose systems for various downstream tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Foundation models|TYPE|large-scale pre-trained models
    Foundation models|PURPOSE|general-purpose systems
    Foundation models|APPLIES_TO|various downstream tasks

  proposition: OpenAI released GPT-4 in December 2022.
    entity-entity relationships:
    OpenAI|RELEASED|GPT-4
    
  proposition: Anthropic released Claude Series in October 2022.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Anthropic|RELEASED|Claude Series

  proposition: OpenAI released ChatGPT in November 2022, gaining over 100 million users in two months.
    entity-entity relationships:
    OpenAI|RELEASED|ChatGPT
    
  proposition: TrustLLM was released in January 2024 for evaluating trustworthiness of LLMs.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    TrustLLM|PURPOSE|evaluating trustworthiness of LLMs
    
  proposition: European Artificial Intelligence Act entered into force in August & September 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    European Artificial Intelligence Act|STATUS|entered into force
